entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
